short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A JavaScript code Editor for DroidScript

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily create Apps for your Android Phone or Tablet using this JavaScript editor and the DroidScript Android companion App.

The DroidScript Editor provides an easy way to write Apps using JavaScript from your computer, with access to active documentation, samples, tutorials and demo Apps.

Connecting to your Android device over Wifi is easy with the DroidScript Editor's Auto detect feature. Simply press the Wifi button in DroidScript on your Android device to make it visible to the DroidScript Editor.

DroidScript Editor requires the latest version of the DroidScript Android App, available for free on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartphoneremote.androidscriptfree
